titles.title: A bill to designate the United States Courthouse located at 10th and Main Streets in Richmond, Virginia, as the "Lewis F. Powell, Jr. United States Courthouse".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3042-3043)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Baucus without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 183.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S11942-11943)

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 3/17/1993--Introduced. Designates the United States courthouse located at 10th and Main Streets, Richmond, Virginia, as the Lewis F. Powell, Jr. United States Courthouse.
